Add-ons - Verification Services

Ensure complete and usable deposits

Learn how software escrow verification lets you ensure you have everything you need to redeploy your business applications and other critical assets.

Codekeeper verification solutions

We offer four levels of verification to ensure that all parties to an escrow agreement get the level of protection they need. The level that’s right for you depends on your budget, risk tolerance, and degree of customization.

GET STARTED

Our Automated Verification Services:

Verification

Verification

A profile of the development activity (changes) on the source code or data.

$19/ repository / month

Verification

A check of the availability of deployed SaaS applications.

$29/ repository / month

Testing of up to 20 key features

Secure your code, data, and peace of mind

Deposit

Escrow deposits sometimes contain files that are corrupted, incomplete, difficult to use, or even contain viruses. Documentation could be missing, passwords could be improperly documented, third-party dependencies not outlined or included, etc.

Verify

Different levels of technical verification are used to validate the completeness, accuracy, and usability of materials deposited into escrow as assurance that the beneficiary will be able to effectively deploy their escrow deposit in case of a release.

Release

Verification provides an additional layer of protection and peace of mind by ensuring the beneficiary has everything that they need for a successful recovery — whether they’re using their developer’s source code in-house, or transitioning to a new supplier.

Take advantage of cost-effective, scalable, enterprise-grade features.

Platform

We help global companies of all sizes protect and manage their most critical assets with minimal effort thanks to a quick set-up process, intuitive UI, and cutting-edge security features.

Frameworks

Codekeeper supports all development frameworks, including Java, .NET, Python, and Node.js, helping improve your team’s agility with seamless automations.

Availability

Securely store your data and maintain its safety and integrity at our state-of-the-art data centers while ensuring around-the-clock availability, whenever you need it.

Scalability

Scale your escrow repositories up and down to meet fluctuating demands. Protect your data for only $79/month, with a start-up fee of $249, including unlimited deposits and more.

Flexibility

Organize your data and configure escrow repositories in ways that meet your specific business, organizational, contractual, and compliance requirements.

Integrations

Whether you use an in-memory database, an online repository, or different physical data centers, we integrate with popular cloud services and custom solutions alike.

Best-in-class security

We’ve built the strictest security standards into the core of our product, and we conduct comprehensive audits of our applications, systems, and networks to ensure your data is always protected.

ISO27001 DATA SECURITY

Our data centers adhere to the highest security standards and security policies. Security is always our first priority.

END-TO-END ENCRYPTION

Data is secured at all times, both in transit and at rest with AES256/512 encryption.

SECURE UPLOAD FOLDER

If you prefer manual upload, our upload folder system also provides you with a secure way to deposit your source code.
